title: Short-Term Course for Practical Marketing Competency Enhancement via Marketing MOOC

context.additional_context: Real-time lectures and mobile-optimized content delivery via smartphones.

learning_goals: Ability to explain three core principles of marketing strategy development
Learners can practice using two or more digital marketing tools
Learners can apply data interpretation techniques for target customer analysis
Learners can revise and improve their marketing plans through peer evaluation within a learning community

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
